profileText: a Representative from Tennessee; born in Nashville, Davidson County, Tenn., June 18, 1971; graduated from Franklin High School, Franklin, Tenn., 1990; B.S., Middle Tennessee State University, Murfreesboro, Tenn., 2007; business owner; nonprofit executive; professional advocate; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Eighth Congress in 2002; campaign staff, presidential campaign of Newton Leroy Gingrich, 2012; Mayor of Maury County, Tenn., 2018-2022; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
